message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  However, $10,000 is below the product's value.  Could you do $13,000?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Can we do that?
